products.name: Celeste
products.description: Celeste is vibrant, fruity, and beautifully feminine. It blends sparkling fruity notes with soft floral tones, creating a scent that feels youthful and glamorous. Bright and uplifting, Celeste is perfect for daytime wear, brunches, and special gatherings. It's playful, confident, and irresistibly charming.
products.inspiration: Inspired by Bombshell by Victoria's Secret

products.name: Eclave
products.description: Eclave is a rich, warm, and addictive fragrance that radiates luxury. With its sweet amber warmth and smooth woody undertones, it creates a glowing aura around the wearer. Mysterious yet elegant, Eclave is perfect for evenings, special occasions, and moments when you want to stand out effortlessly. It's bold, long-lasting, and unforgettable.

products.name: Fiora
products.description: Fiora is delicate, romantic, and graceful. With blooming floral accords and a soft, elegant base, it captures the beauty of a fresh garden in full bloom. Feminine and refined, Fiora is ideal for women who appreciate elegance and timeless charm. It's soft yet memorable — a fragrance that speaks gently but leaves a lasting impression.
products.inspiration: Inspired by Gucci Flora by Gucci

products.name: Scarzaar
products.description: Scarzaar is powerful, fresh, and magnetic. It opens with a burst of crisp freshness followed by spicy and woody notes that create a strong masculine presence. Designed for confident men who lead from the front, Scarzaar is versatile — perfect for daily wear or evening events. It leaves a clean, bold trail that commands attention.
